post_title: FS: Lot of 12 Lower Grade T206 HOF - Brown, Collins, Evers, Lajoie
post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 HOF cards for sale. These are all lower grade cards, as the scans will show.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

[STRIKE]Bresnahan - $100 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
M. Brown (Polar Bear) - $300
E. Collins (Piedmont) - $250
E. Collins (Sweet Caporal) - $250
Duffy - $125
Evers - $200
Flick - $100
Huggins - $60
[STRIKE]Jennings (Polar Bear) - $100 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Lajoie (tiny pinhole near top right corner) - $450 **SOLD**[/STRIKE]
McGraw (with cap - Old Mill) - $200
McGraw (no cap) - $125
